name: Alliance Portable Table Metal
descr:
Acupuncturists love the Alliance for its adjustable back rest top. Therapists who treat pregnant woman or cardiac care patients know they are better treated if they aren`t asked to lie flat. For spa and aesthetic treatment and especially when pregnant clients or clients with cardiac or respiratory concerns cant lie plat, your work is often better done with your clients head raised. The portable Alliance table adjustable back rest is just what your are looking for.

Specifications: 182,5x67,5x60/85 cm.
